text: Thomas Ethelbert Skilling, III (born February 20, 1952), known on-air as Tom Skilling, is an American television meteorologist. He was born in Aurora, Illinois, but works in Chicago, Illinois. He is chief meteorologist for the weekday on WGN-TV (channel 9). He is the highest paid local broadcast meteorologist in the United States. Chicago Magazine - The Cult of Tom. He also writes the daily weather column in the Chicago Tribune. ==References== ==Other websites== * Skilling's Fermilab Seminar * * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:American meteorologists Category:American columnists Category:Writers from Chicago Category:People from Aurora, Illinois
title: Tom Skilling
